response.explain: The previous action code successfully opened the fridge as per the first subtask. There were no execution errors. The next step is to put the chicken, which the robot already has in its inventory, into the fridge.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the fridge.
(2) Put the chicken in the fridge.
(3) Take out the steak from the bottom cabinet.
(4) Put the steak in the fridge.
(5) Close the fridge.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 2: Put the chicken in the fridge
    chicken = registry(env, "chicken_176")
    fridge = registry(env, "fridge_xyejdx_0")
    put_inside(robot, chicken, fridge)
    donothing(env)
